div.p: Potential distributions as probability of occurrence for E. henryi in China (A) at present (1950 â€“2000), (B) at the Last Interglacial (LIG; c. 130kya), (C) at the Last Glacial Maximum (LGM; c. 21kya), and (D) in the future (2080, A2 scenario). Ecological niche models were established with current bioclimatic variables on the basis of extant occurrence points (black dots) of the species using maxent v.3.2.1. Predicted distribution probabilities (in logistic values) are shown in each 2.5 arc-min pixel. Maps were generated using ArcGIS v.9.3 (ESRI, Redlands, CA, USA) 94.
